title: X Marks the Spot (1931 Crime film) Director: Erle C. Kenton (b&w + Colorized)

sources.title: X Marks the Spot (1931 Crime film) Director: Erle C. Kenton (b&w + Colorized)
sources.description:
Desperate reporter Ted Lloyd borrows money from gangster Riggs to save his sister's life. Eight years later, Ted becomes the prime suspect in a showgirl's murder and uncovers that the real culprit is Riggs, the man who once helped him. A gripping twist of fate unravels in a tense courtroom showdown.

Duo Movie with :
00:00 Black & White version of X Marks the Spot 
52:40 Colorized version 

Main Cast:
Lew Cody - George Howard
Sally Blane - Sue
Wallace Ford - Ted Lloyd
Fred Kohler - Riggs
Mary Nolan - Vivian Parker
Virginia Lee Corbin - Hortense
Helen Parrish - young Gloria
Joyce Coad - Gloria
Charles B. Middleton - Attorney
Clarence Muse - Servant

X Marks the Spot is a 1931 American pre-Code crime drama film directed by Erle C. Kenton.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
